scripts.clasppull: npm run clasplogin && cd ~/workspace/closeout-email-utilities/dist && clasp pull && cd ~/workspace/closeout-email-utilities/ && npm run clasplogout
scripts.clasppush: npm run clasplogin && cd ~/workspace/closeout-email-utilities/dist && clasp push && cd ~/workspace/closeout-email-utilities/ && npm run clasplogout && rm ~/workspace/closeout-email-utilities/dist/CombinedWebpackCode.*.js
